member.name: IMFActivate.ActivateObject
member.summary: Creates the object associated with this activation object.
member.param: Interface identifier (IID) of the requested interface.
Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFActivate.DetachObject
member.summary: Detaches the created object from the activation object.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFActivate.GetDouble
member.summary: Retrieves a double value associated with a key.
member.param: GUID that identifies which value to retrieve. The attribute type must be MF_ATTRIBUTE_DOUBLE.
Receives a double value. If the key is found and the data type is double, the method copies the value into this parameter. Otherwise, the original value of this parameter is not changed.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified key was not found.
The attribute value is not a double.

member.name: IMFActivate
member.summary: Enables the application to defer the creation of an object. This interface is exposed by activation objects.
